com.mygdx.game.controller

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.controller.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.ContactListener

    public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.ContactListener
    Controls the physics aspect of the game.
